name: The Claim
description:
This wonderful block of text is the description for the game jam entry "The Claim" for the VR Jam 2021. The theme is "Small World." This jam entry is an APK file, to be loaded via Oculus Developer Hub onto a Quest 2, or maybe SideQuest will work. Play it, rate it, spin it, touch it, rate it, lick it, rate it, rate it.

If you skip the exposition text, you're a scoundrel deserving of nothing good.

Teleport locomotion is default, but you can change to smooth locomotion if you're one of those gifted individuals who don't lose their lunch easily.  Use the left hand palm display to adjust settings, including listening to a nice music track. On that note (buh dum bum)... EXCITING NEWS, EVERYBODY: There is a lag spike when you first click to choose to listen to the very nice music track. You're very welcome. It's just the once. Other glitches are part of the experience and should not be frowned upon.

There's no ending, so when you feel like you've done what there is to do, you've probably done what there is to do.

Credits are in the game when you've exhausted all three waves of very-intimidating-but-not-dangerous-at-all pirate ships, but they're here as well:
